Introducing the Search Me Extension

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing the extension and setting chrome new tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in terms of use https://random-year-facts.com/terms and Privacy Policy https://random-year-facts.com/privacy
